3.1 M7

Got a similar exception by invoking the "for - iterate over array" template two
times in a row, the undoing.

The error looks quite bad for such a common scenario. Looks like a reasonably
important "polishing" bug.
I have also see this twice today.

Please update state Christof.

Thx,
Ben
